thread.title: Two Countries gets a December release date
thread.title_full: Two Countries gets a December release date - The Times of India

author: Sanjith Sidhardhan
title: Two Countries gets a December release date
text:
Shafi's Two Countries have officially wrapped up filming and is headed for post production. Sources close to the production team tells us that the filmmakers are now aiming for a December release.
"There are a lot of VFX works to be done," says our source, adding that it would take the entire October to wind that up. The film shot for 35 days in Canada and another one month in Ernakulam.
Two Countries has Dileep and Mamta Mohandas playing the lead.
